thread.title: Macarons, happy birthday song, bookshelf and very helpful and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Macarons, happy birthday song, bookshelf and very helpful and friendly staff - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: KimvdHorst
title: Macarons, happy birthday song, bookshelf and very helpful and friendly staff
text:
We stayed in room 1506 for 8 nights. It was nice because we had two sinks so both of us could spread out the make up and toiletries. The staff was super friendly always ready to help out and willing to chat. On my birthday they left a box with two macarons and a card in our room. The hotel has a classic feel to it and you can see that the owner has an infinity to art. A nice detail is the bookshelf with books you can read in the room.
Green Features: They remind you about re-using the towels other than that I'm not sure
